about_the_game:
Dive into an explosive adventure where every move matters! In Heroic, you're a one-person army fighting off relentless waves of enemies. From the get-go, you're equipped with a powerful set of abilities—it’s up to you to master them and dominate the battlefield. Inspired by the most intense anime battle scenes, get ready to dash, strike, and obliterate your foes with style.

⚡ Key Features:

  • Omnidirectional Dash: Zip across the battlefield in any direction with fast, fluid movement.

  • Powerful Punch: Launch enemies into the air or slam them to the ground with devastating punches.

  • Energy Attacks: Fire rapid energy balls, unleash a massive projectile, or create energy explosions around you.

  • Area Attacks: Sweep through entire zones with a single blow, taking down multiple enemies at once.

  • Diagonal Kick: Surprise your opponents with a stylish, diagonal kick.

  • Enemy Attraction: Pull enemies toward you and set up devastating combos.

🎮 Fast-Paced Combat:

It’s just you against endless waves of invaders, but your power lies in mastering your full range of abilities. Whether it’s dashing through the air, smashing enemies with powerful punches, or blasting them with energy, you need to strategize and chain your attacks for maximum impact (and maximum fun!).

Experience the thrill of combat inspired by epic anime fights, with fast combos, powerful attacks, and heart-pounding action!

🚀 Try now and prove your skills!

Your mission? Master every ability and face off against waves of invaders. So what are you waiting for? Try Heroic and dive into the battle today!

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB, OpenGL 3+
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Heroic is a 2D action beat-them-all where you play as a young hero defending a modern city from relentless hordes of enemies. Master aerial combos, unleash your full abilities from the start. Survive intense waves, rescue citizens, and prove your heroism against an ever-growing threat!
